page.title: 11THE CARLSBERG BREWERY
page.content: We visited the Brewery in July 1985.We entered by the main entrance in Bridge Street.We learnt that the project began in 1969 and went through four stages of development ending in 1979.Lager brew- ing began in 1973.It is interesting to note that this Danish firm chose a site overlooked by the site of a 9th.Century Danish settlement.The total cost so far of this Brewery is about L100M, capable of producing 2M. barrels.Its ambitious architecture was designed by Knud Munk and was awarded the Financial Times Award for Industrial Architecture.This year marks the 35th.anniversary of one of its popular brews-Carlsberg Special Brew-inspired by a visit to Copenhagen by Sir Winston Churchill.The drink is brewed and stored for a long time and sold in bottles and cans but not on draught.The Company was one of the first to aid art,science,and medicine.
